title: Darigaaz, the Igniter
text: FlyingWhenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay . If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals his or her hand and Darigaaz deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards of that color revealed this way.
